job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Senior Consultant
job.description:
- Experience with building and deploying ML-based solutions and proficiency in common machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn, Pytorch and ONNX

- Experience with designing, building, and maintaining production-grade ML and DL models, machine learning workflows and pipelines

- Experience with deploying ML Solutions on AWS / GCP or Azure cloud platforms and exposure to cloud services necessary to build end to end pipeline

- Relevant consulting or industry experience. Travel involved.


Limited immigration sponsorship may be available


 Locations - New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, Boston etc.

company.name: Arth Consulting - An Executive Search Firm
